Text: whats with the huge sample size?

@canseven & p43082:
Its 2.17 GB because the uploader seemed to have packaged up an HD recording (Which can be upwards of 1+ GB.... *ITS HD*) twice.. The sample is a dup of the show. If you have a decent client you can just ignore the sample and download the show itself.
Oh, and thanx for the upload AiTB!
Just saw the episode and instantly thought of N.E.R.D's "Seeing Sounds" album, which is all about how Pharrell is seeing sounds.  Maybe the writer of the show likes N.E.R.D.
